body:
This looks like the _mdframed_ issue which is already fixed in master (see #4112).
If you cannot switch to master you can try to downgrade your mdframed.sty package (This is a LaTeX package). As mentioned in #4041 you will need a mdframed version around 1.5 (e.g. from TexLive2012 or marcodaniel/mdframed@b36e43cc75dfb1bcf06f42dda3d658ba8f6f365f)

Hi Jakob, thanks for the reply. I re-installed from master and now I get the following error:

```
?

l.404 \texttt{B} $senc(K, Cert_A |
                                  | sign(pvk(A), <N, B>))$. Thus \texttt{M}

Transcript written on "Computer Security Assignment 1.log".

[NbConvertApp] Removing temporary LaTeX files
```
Can you provide a minimal notebook with this error. It is hard to judge if the latex error you get is a result of the pandoc conversion, some ipython preprocessing issue or something else.

After debugging this, I found that the problem was in the vertical bars in the following expression:

$senc(K, Cert_A || sign(pvk(A), <N, B>))$

After changing this to \vert instead of | everything is ok:

$senc(K, Cert_A \vert \vert sign(pvk(A), <N, B>))$
So you can close this issue?!

I can reproduce this error with simply

```
$\text{abcd}$
```

in a markdown cell. Then with `ipython nbconvert notebook.ipynb --to pdf --template report` it fails.
